0.name: The Cloud Gate aka The Bean
0.snippet_text:
I came to see the Bean, I touched the Bean, I took picture with the Bean, I walked under the Bean, and I walked out like a champ.

Believe it or not, but...

1.name: Willis Tower
1.snippet_text: First things first.  The locals of Chicago will never call this place Willis Tower.  So, they will always refer to it as it was originally intended to be,...

2.name: Millennium Park
2.snippet_text: After visiting many other cities, I am really thankful for having this huge $475 million park in Chicago. Besides New York, you will not find a better park...
